title: If there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message.
description: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series in a chart, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to inform the user.
SR:
1. Create a chart and define the data.
2. Select a column that does not have any data.
3. Observe if a friendly error message is displayed.
